page.title: 14PRIMARY EDUCATION
page.content: The schoolhouse was built in in 1872 and has remained in use as such ever since. Unfortunately there are no records of admissions or log books to be found in the school or Area Education office. This is a great shame as much information could have been gleaned from such documents about the school and the island as a whole. This position has been rectified recently. There are currently 2 pupils from the same family attending school. Unfortunately in August there will only be 1 as the older child leaves to go to secondary school. This will not be the first time the school has had only one pupil and there have been periods when the school has been shut because there were no pupils.
